name: Vexx
description: Vexx is a 2003 platforming video game developed by Acclaim Studios Austin and published by Acclaim Entertainment for the PlayStation 2, GameCube and Xbox video game consoles. The game was released in North America on February 11, 2003 and in Europe on April 4, 2003. The objective consists of collecting magical hearts and unlocking more worlds to play, defeating enemies and jumping across platforms. Vexx is armed only with the legendary Astani war talons, which give him the power to defeat his enemies, as well as fly and swim under water.
